items.content_html: This is a simple notepad app designed to demonstrate the basics of React development. The goal was to create a lightweight and functional notepad that allows users to perform CRUD operations on notes. It's ideal for those looking to understand the fundamentals of React, state management, and working with local storage.
items.title: masechkacat/Block-Note-React: This is a simple notepad app designed to demonstrate the basics of React development. The goal was to create a lightweight and functional notepad that allows users to perform CRUD  operations on notes. It's ideal for those looking to understand the fundamentals of React, state management, and working with local storage.
